animeTitle: Detective Conan Movie 17: Private Eye in the Distant Sea Movie
otherNames: Detective Conan Movie 17, Meitantei Conan: Sekkai no Private Eye, 名探偵コナン・絶海の探偵
synopsis: The movie is set on a state-of-the art Aegis vessel with the full cooperation of Japan's Ministry of Defence and Maritime Self-Defence Force. The heroine Ran is put in jeopardy, and Conan is forced to stand up against a dangerous criminal.
